slides.title: Welcome to Internal Audit
slides.content:
# Internal Audit & Controls

Internal audit provides **independent assurance** to management.

## What You Will Learn

- **Internal Audit** - Role and function
- **Internal Control** - Frameworks
- **Risk Assessment** - Identification
- **Audit Process** - Methodology

## Topics

| Area | Focus |
|------|-------|
| Internal audit | IIA standards |
| Controls | COSO framework |
| Risk | Assessment |
| Process | Methodology |

slides.title: Internal Audit Function
slides.content:
# Role of Internal Audit

## Definition

```
Independent, objective assurance
and consulting activity
```

## Value Added

| Area | Contribution |
|------|-------------|
| Governance | Oversight |
| Risk | Management |
| Controls | Effectiveness |
| Operations | Efficiency |

## Reporting

- Administratively to management
- Functionally to audit committee

## IIA Standards

- Attribute standards
- Performance standards

slides.title: COSO Framework
slides.content:
# Internal Control Framework

## Five Components

| Component | Focus |
|-----------|-------|
| Control environment | Foundation |
| Risk assessment | Identification |
| Control activities | Policies |
| Information | Communication |
| Monitoring | Ongoing/separate |

## 17 Principles

Each component has supporting principles.

## Control Objectives

| Category | Focus |
|----------|-------|
| Operations | Effectiveness |
| Reporting | Reliability |
| Compliance | Laws/regulations |

slides.title: Control Activities
slides.content:
# Types of Controls

## By Timing

| Type | When |
|------|------|
| Preventive | Before event |
| Detective | After event |
| Corrective | Fix issues |

## By Nature

| Type | Examples |
|------|----------|
| Authorization | Approval |
| Segregation | Separate duties |
| Physical | Lock and key |
| Reconciliation | Match records |

## Segregation of Duties

```
Separate:
- Authorization
- Custody
- Recording
- Reconciliation
```

slides.title: Risk Assessment
slides.content:
# Risk-Based Approach

## Risk Categories

| Category | Examples |
|----------|----------|
| Strategic | Competition |
| Operational | Process |
| Financial | Reporting |
| Compliance | Regulatory |

## Risk Assessment Steps

```
1. Identify risks
2. Assess likelihood
3. Assess impact
4. Evaluate controls
5. Determine residual risk
```

## Risk Matrix

| | Low Impact | High Impact |
|---|------------|-------------|
| High Likelihood | Medium | High |
| Low Likelihood | Low | Medium |
